ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess un-nerfed? DOUBLE the ef fect?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually what he ment is if he fires up the song for only one tic, it will heal 45hp, i beleive him.  I do that when i play mana song, will do 2 your mind
ygData.messageBody:
Actually what he ment is if he fires up the song for only one tic,
it will heal 45hp, i beleive him. I do that when i play mana song, will do
2 "your mind clears" and 1 "your wounds begin to heal" that little heal
icon heals you 2 or 3 times (i forgot how many times) and each little heal
it does to you at my level is 14 i beleive, so that means im doing about
28hp per tic. but if he's only playing heal song, then all in all, every
time a "begin to heal" message pops up, he's getting about 17hp or so. i
dunno if im making sense but it explains what he's saying IMO

Minkin Nehoc
sol ro
Level 35 bard


> ---snip--
> > Well, a guildmate of mine stated today that he is now able to
> > heal 45 points
> > per tick with his Lute of the Gypsy Princess found in
> > Mistmoore.
> --snip--
